| `layout`             | `layout`  | Specifies the layout of the component.                                  | `"horizontal" \| "vertical"` | `"horizontal"` |
| `messageOverrides`   | --        | Use this property to override individual strings used by the component. | `{ more?: string; }`         | `undefined`    |
